string-array.name: motivational_quotes
string-array.item: "Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment."
"Willpower is what gets you started, discipline is what keeps you going."
"Time is the only currency you have, spend it wisely."
"Success doesn't come from what you do occasionally, but from what you do consistently."
"Focus on your goals, crowded places don't make leaders."
"If you don't plan for success, you're planning for failure."
"Always remember why you started, and don't give in to trivialities."
"Every minute you spend in a blocked app is a minute wasted from your future."
"You control your phone, don't let your phone control you."
"Be the best version of yourself today."
